hero_title: Turn Healthcare Data Into Clinical Intelligence
hero_content:
OMOP-based infrastructure platform for secure AI research with native MCP and AI coding support (Beta).

Transform clinical data from Epic and Cerner. Power datathons with 100+ researchers. Enable AI deployment in healthcare environments.
clients_title: Trusted by Tier 1 Health Systems & Research Networks
quote_content: This is a game changer for clinical AI research. The platform's seamless integration with our existing systems and secure deployment capabilities have transformed how we bring AI innovations to patient care. We've successfully hosted datathons with 100+ researchers.
